Address Space - ETROC2:
PeriStat0 - 0b10101010 to 0b00101010
PeriStat3 - 0b01000000 to 0b01000001
SEU Counter 0 - 0b00000101 to 0b00100000
PixStat6 Pixel 4,2 - 0b00000000 to 0b00000100
PixStat1 Pixel 8,2 - 0b11000110 to 0b00000110
PixStat2 Pixel 11,2 - 0b10010111 to 0b00010111
PixStat2 Pixel 10,3 - 0b10000100 to 0b10010100
PixStat3 Pixel 13,3 - 0b11000001 to 0b11000000
PixStat3 Pixel 5,5 - 0b11000001 to 0b11000011
PixStat2 Pixel 15,6 - 0b10000100 to 0b10000000
PixStat3 Pixel 1,7 - 0b11000001 to 0b11000000
PixStat1 Pixel 8,9 - 0b11000110 to 0b10000110
PixStat1 Pixel 13,10 - 0b11001000 to 0b01001000
PixStat2 Pixel 12,12 - 0b01111010 to 0b01110010
PixStat1 Pixel 15,13 - 0b11000110 to 0b11000111
PixStat6 Pixel 13,14 - 0b00000000 to 0b00000100
